        height -
        rightToLeft - true so that the order of the components is from right to left.
        components -

        A JStatusBar ready to use.

        public static JStatusBar createStatusBar(int width,
                                         boolean rightToLeft,
                                         Component... components)
                                  throws InvalidParameterException
        Create a status bar with the width, orientation and content assigned. The default height is 20px.
        Parameters:
        width -
        rightToLeft - true so that the order of the components is from right to left.
        components -
        Returns:
        A JStatusBar ready to use.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - In case some parameter does not comply and / or some internal error.
        See Also:

      • insertComponentToLastPanel

        public static JStatusBar insertComponentToLastPanel(JStatusBar statusBar,
                                                    Component component)
                                             throws InvalidParameterException
        Insert a component to the last panel of the status bar to modify.
        Parameters:
        statusBar - Status bar to modify.
        component - The component to add.
        Returns:
        The same status bar.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - In case statusBar or component are null or if the component to be modified is not available in the bar.
